name: Deep Sleeper
description:
You are tired and all you wanna do is
to have a good sleepying night...

You're now asleep, so you have to fight
your nightmares not only to sleep well, 
but deeply...

Originaly made as part of the Alakajam #8 theme, only to test myself. It's not finished yet, because I didn't have the proper time to do it.

It's my first game, so... feedback is appreciated.
